title: Hawaiian Rock'n Roll
synopsis: A music video for the song "Hawaiian Rock'n Roll" by Yukari Itou. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.
staff: [['Komatsu, Hisashi', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Itou, Yukari', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Horiguchi, Tadahiko', ['Animation Director']]]
